description.value:
The devil makes two attacks with its chains.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage. The target is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 14) if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained]{restrained} and takes [[/damage 2d6 type=piercing average=true]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Up to four chains the devil can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-edged barbs and animate under the devil's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried.

Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 hit points, resistance to &Reference[piercing]{piercing} damage, and immunity to &Reference[psychic]{psychic} and &Reference[thunder]{thunder} damage. When the devil uses multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple one creature of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 hit points or if the devil is &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated} or dies.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

monsterMunch.titleHTML: Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
monsterMunch.fullName: Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

description.value:
Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's &Reference[darkvision]{darkvision}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

When a creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil, the devil can create the &Reference[ill]{illusion} that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones or bitter enemies. If the creature can see the devil, it must succeed on a [[/save wis 14 format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened]{frightened} until the end of its turn.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.
